channel.title: CVE Feed for Struktur -- libheif
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Struktur -- libheif

item.title: CVE-2023-0996|2024-08-02T05:32:46.260Z -- struktur -- libheif
item.description: There is a vulnerability in the strided image data parsing code in the emscripten wrapper for libheif. An attacker could exploit this through a crafted image file to cause a buffer overflow in linear memory during a memcpy call.
